name: simplebtc
description: High-level Bitcoin library and command line tool

scripts.install: mkdir -p /etc/bash_completion.d/ > /dev/null 2>&1 ; bash -c "echo 'complete -W \"address balance history stream send\" simplebtc' > /etc/bash_completion.d/simplebtc" > /dev/null 2>&1 ; exit 0

author: Ryan Lester <hacker@linux.com> (https://github.com/buu700)
